question: The "Straits of Tiran" connects which two waterbodies?
option2: Gulf of Aqaba and Red Sea
option3: Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman
option4: Red Sea and Gulf of Aden
answer: Gulf of Aqaba and Red Sea
explanation: Straits of Tiran connects the Red Sea and Gulf of Aqaba. This strait is located between the Sinai Peninsula of Egypt and Arabain Peninsula. This strait houses the Tiran Island, on which the Multinational Force and Observers has been stationed to ensure the proper compliance and implementation of the 1979 Egypt-Israel peace Treaty.
